sys_app_scan_payload.serialized_record:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_composite_data_template"><sys_ux_composite_data_template action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><name>Request card</name><sys_class_name>sys_ux_composite_data_template</sys_class_name><sys_created_by/><sys_created_on/><sys_id>!!!sys_id_1992!!!</sys_id><sys_mod_count/><sys_name/><sys_package display_value="">!!!app_sys_id!!!</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="">!!!app_sys_id!!!</sys_scope><sys_update_name/><sys_updated_by/><sys_updated_on/><template>{
	"component":"now-card-evam-record",
	"staticValues": {
        "imageType": {"translatable": false, "key":"image"},
		"detailLabelOne":{"translatable": false, "key": "Date Required"},
		"detailLabelTwo":{"translatable": false, "key": "Return Date"},
		"detailLabelThree":{"translatable": false, "key": "Inventory Type"},
		"detailLabelFour":{"translatable": false, "key": "Stock Location"}
	},
	"mappings" : {
		"titleLabel":"requested_item.name",
        "textHeaderLabel":"number",
        "imageURL":"requested_item.image",
        "subtitle":"requested_item.category",
        "detailValueOne":"request_date",
        "detailValueTwo":"return_date",
        "detailValueThree":"requested_item.type",
		"detailValueFour":"stock_location.name"
	},
	"actionMappings" : {
        "clickAction":"navigation"
	}
}
</template></sys_ux_composite_data_template></record_update>
